preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 350 g of tin using a precise electronic scale. 
 2. Measure 280 g of terbium. 
 3. Measure 140 g of titanium. 
 4. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all three metals thoroughly using a stirrer or spatula to ensure uniformity.
